Using proxies who had registered over 20 companies, Rigathi obtained over sh 1.7 billion from close to 10 government ministries, state departments, parastatals, and county governments.
A comprehensive investigation done by sleuths based at the serious crime unit, unearthed details of how the MP used different companies to fraudulently secure government tenders.
